entry.title: Costa Ricanan - Butterfly Toddler T-Shirt | Cute Kids
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: Kids clothes
Price: 19.99

Introduce a splash of color and joy into your child’s wardrobe with this delightful toddler T-shirt, featuring a stunning butterfly design that sparks imagination and curiosity. This classic-fit shirt is perfect for playdates, outings, or simply lounging at home. Its soft, light fabric ensures maximum comfort for all-day wear, making it a must-have for every little explorer. Perfect for birthdays, family gatherings, and nature-themed celebrations, this T-shirt is an ideal gift for young nature enthusiasts or aspiring adventurers. Celebrate the beauty of nature with this butterfly-themed T-shirt that encourages your child to embrace their creativity and joy!

Product features
- Made from preshrunk ringspun cotton for a soft feel.
- Designed with side seams for structured shape.
- Shoulder and neck taped for stability and comfort.
- Durable double needle stitching for long-lasting wear.
- Lightweight fabric at 4.5 oz/yd² for airy comfort.

Care instructions
- Machine wash: cold (max 30C or 90F)
- Non-chlorine: bleach as needed
- Tumble dry: low heat
- Iron, steam or dry: low heat
- Do not dry clean

Introducing this adorable Baby Onesie, the perfect blend of comfort and style for your little one. Made from 100% cotton, it offers a soft and gentle touch on delicate skin, ensuring your baby feels cozy all day long. The cheerful design brings a joyful vibe, ideal for capturing sweet moments at home or during outings. Perfect for new parents, this onesie is a thoughtful gift for baby showers, birthdays, or any celebration that embraces the joy of parenting. It fits seamlessly into your baby’s wardrobe for everyday wear or special occasions like family gatherings and holidays.

Product features
- 100% Cotton for ultimate softness
- Expandable lap shoulder neckline for easy dressing
- Convenient snap button closure for quick changes
- Ribbed leg openings for a snug fit
- Includes a printed care label for easy maintenance

Care instructions
